data.lyric:
[ti:Five More Minutes]
[ar:Scotty McCreery]
[al:Five More Minutes]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Five More Minutes - Scotty McCreery (斯考迪-迈克克里瑞)
[00:12.62]Eight years old a couple cane poles sitting down by the creek
[00:17.23]
[00:18.52]Our lines in the water watching those bobbers seeing that red sun sink
[00:23.41]
[00:24.76]Mama's on the porch yelling supper's hot y'all come and get it
[00:30.38]We yelled five more minutes
[00:34.53]
[00:37.47]At sixteen it was twelve o three standing at her front door
[00:41.78]
[00:43.69]Katie's dad said midnight but we needed just a little more
[00:47.88]
[00:49.75]Yellow light flipping on and off and we're up to that goodnight kissing
[00:54.22]
[00:55.03]We wanted five more minutes
[00:59.41]
[01:01.80]Time rolls by the clock don't stop
[01:03.81]
[01:04.51]I wish I had a few more drops
[01:06.82]
[01:07.53]Of the good stuff the good times
[01:10.13]
[01:11.17]Oh but they just keep on flying
[01:13.23]
[01:14.08]Right on by like it ain't nothing
[01:16.19]
[01:17.11]Wish I had me a pause button
[01:19.53]
[01:20.08]Moments like those lord knows I'd hit it
[01:23.76]
[01:25.59]Give myself five more minutes
[01:29.93]
[01:35.94]At eighteen turned my helmet in and walked to the fifty yard line
[01:40.15]
[01:41.47]It's just the coach and me after we lost eighteen to nine
[01:46.41]
[01:47.06]And I cried man next time to get in here
[01:50.02]
[01:51.25]I'll have to buy a ticket
[01:52.61]
[01:53.34]Can't you give me five more minutes
[01:57.49]
[02:00.23]Time rolls by the clock don't stop
[02:02.29]
[02:03.01]I wish I had a few more drops
[02:05.32]
[02:05.94]Of the good stuff the good times
[02:08.67]
[02:09.65]Oh but they just keep on flying
[02:11.62]
[02:12.53]Right on by like it ain't nothing
[02:14.73]
[02:15.47]Wish I had me a pause button
[02:18.02]
[02:18.54]Moments like those lord knows I'd hit it
[02:22.11]
[02:24.02]Give myself five more minutes
[02:28.28]
[02:40.58]At eighty six my grandpa said there's angels in the room
[02:44.58]
[02:46.38]With all the family gathered 'round we knew that time was coming soon
[02:50.83]
[02:52.39]With so much left to say I prayed lord I ain't finished
[02:58.02]Just give us five more minutes
[03:02.05]
[03:04.87]Time rolls by the clock don't stop
[03:06.88]
[03:07.66]I wish I had a few more drops
[03:09.87]
[03:10.51]Of the good stuff the good times
[03:13.16]
[03:14.30]Oh but they just keep on flying
[03:16.29]
[03:17.08]Right on by like it ain't nothing
[03:19.32]
[03:20.05]Wish I had me a pause button
[03:23.12]Moments like those lord knows I'd hit it
[03:26.75]
[03:28.99]Yeah sometimes this all life will leave you wishing
[03:32.66]
[03:34.77]That you had five more minutes
[03:38.87]
[03:44.77]Oh five more minutes
data.trans:
[ti:Five More Minutes]
[ar:Scotty McCreery]
[al:Five More Minutes]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:12.62]在我八岁的时候 一对夫妇坐在小溪边的藤椅上
[00:17.23]
[00:18.52]我们在河边垂钓 看着河水上的浮标 夕阳渐渐西沉
[00:23.41]
[00:24.76]妈妈在门厅叫喊着 午饭已经做好 你们都回来吃饭
[00:30.38]我们回应说 再给我们五分钟
[00:34.53]
[00:37.47]十六岁的时候 12点的时候 站在前门里
[00:41.78]
[00:43.69]凯特的爸爸说午夜到了 但是我们还未尽兴
[00:47.88]
[00:49.75]黄色的灯光忽明忽暗 我们亲吻告别
[00:54.22]
[00:55.03]我们想再要五分钟
[00:59.41]
[01:01.80]时间滴滴答答 不会停歇
[01:03.81]
[01:04.51]我希望我有多一些时间
[01:06.82]
[01:07.53]去享受那些美好的事物 美好的瞬间
[01:10.13]
[01:11.17]但是逝者如斯夫
[01:13.23]
[01:14.08]白驹过隙 不留情面
[01:16.19]
[01:17.11]希望我可以按下暂停键
[01:19.53]
[01:20.08]留下那些让我心动的瞬间
[01:23.76]
[01:25.59]给自己五分钟时间
[01:29.93]
[01:35.94]十八岁的时候 带上头盔 速度飚至50码
[01:40.15]
[01:41.47]但是我们迟到了 只有教练和我两个人
[01:46.41]
[01:47.06]我痛哭流涕 只有等待下次才能进去
[01:50.02]
[01:51.25]我必须买票才能进入
[01:52.61]
[01:53.34]难道就不能多给我五分钟的时间
[01:57.49]
[02:00.23]时间滴滴答答 不会停歇
[02:02.29]
[02:03.01]我希望我有多一些时间
[02:05.32]
[02:05.94]去享受那些美好的事物 美好的瞬间
[02:08.67]
[02:09.65]但是逝者如斯夫
[02:11.62]
[02:12.53]白驹过隙 不留情面
[02:14.73]
[02:15.47]希望我可以按下暂停键
[02:18.02]
[02:18.54]留下那些让我心动的瞬间
[02:22.11]
[02:24.02]给自己五分钟时间
[02:28.28]
[02:40.58]86岁的爷爷说在房间里有个天使
[02:44.58]
[02:46.38]全家都在场 我们知道他大限将至
[02:50.83]
[02:52.39]还有那么多话要说 我向上帝祈祷 我还没有说完
[02:58.02]只要再多给我五分钟的时间
[03:02.05]
[03:04.87]时间滴滴答答 不会停歇
[03:06.88]
[03:07.66]我希望我有多一些时间
[03:09.87]
[03:10.51]去享受那些美好的事物 美好的瞬间
[03:13.16]
[03:14.30]但是逝者如斯夫
[03:16.29]
[03:17.08]白驹过隙 不留情面
[03:19.32]
[03:20.05]希望我可以按下暂停键
[03:23.12]留下那些让我心动的瞬间
[03:26.75]
[03:28.99]是的 有时候你会用一生去祈祷
[03:32.66]
[03:34.77]能再有五分钟的时间
[03:38.87]
[03:44.77]再有五分钟的时间
